trans-unit.source: Represents a static header item on a smart tag panel.

Like the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionTextItem> base class, <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionHeaderItem> represents individual static text items in a smart tag panel.
However, <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionHeaderItem> entries are displayed using bold text.
Typically, a header item is used to create a heading for a group of items in a panel.
Clicking on a header item causes no action.

Individual panel items are associated together to form a panel by calling the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList.GetSortedActionItems%2A> method of the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList> class.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionHeaderItem"></xref> class using the provided name string.

This constructor sets both the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionItem.DisplayName%2A> and the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionItem.Category%2A> properties to the value of the `displayName` parameter and sets the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionItem.Description%2A> property to `null`.
The text to be displayed in the header.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionHeaderItem"></xref> class using the provided name and category strings.
This constructor sets the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionItem.Description%2A> property to `null`.
The text to be displayed in the header.
The case-sensitive <xref href="System.String"></xref> that defines the groupings of panel entries.
